name: el_right_from_wide_continuation
description: EL 0 (erase right) starting at the continuation cell of a wide char should clean up the head
comment: Print A, 中 (wide: cols 1-2), BCD. CUP(1,3) → cursor at (0,2) the continuation cell. EL 0 erases from (0,2) to end of line. The wide char head at (0,1) is cleaned up because its continuation was erased.
